name: Bombalayas
description:
Take control of 1 little bomb, with one attack. Fight your way through 4 levels of little enemy bombs while preventing not to fall down from a suspension bridge. If an enemy bomb reaches you or an explosion knocks you off the bridge,  you have to start again at the beginning of the bridge.

Gameplay

- 3D game environment, 2D style  assets

- Beat 'em up  style combat

- New mechanics or enemies for each level

- Feeling like playing in the heights. If you suffer from acrophobia, this game isn't for you

Features

- 1 character

- A lot of little enemy bombs

- 1 extinguisher attacks you from the sky

- 4 levels

- 2 bridges

- 2 photo background pictures inspired by the Himalayas

Credits

- Music from https://www.zapsplat.com

- Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
